name: Swordbird Song - Tech Demo
description:
Follow the Bird Hero entering the lair of the Iron Owls in this Action RPG for Gameboy.

This game is a Tech Demo for my in-development project called Swordbird Song. The goal of this demo is to test some basic game mechanics and collect some feedback. This tech demo was developed on GB Studio as well as the upcoming game.

D-PAD / ARROW KEYS: MOVE
A / Z: INTERACT
B / X: ATTACK
START / ENTER: PAUSE / MAP

Please send me your feedback.
Add me on Discord: freinicke#9304
Instagram/Twitter/TikTok: @freinicke
